dnn.optimization module¶

class dnn.optimization.Adadelta(data, layers, dropout_ratios=None, loss_func='MSE', parameters=None)¶

Bases: dnn.optimization.Optimizer

Adadelta optimizer. https://github.com/BRML/climin/blob/master/climin/adadelta.py .. [zeiler2013adadelta] Zeiler, Matthew D.

“ADADELTA: An adaptive learning rate method.” arXiv preprint arXiv:1212.5701 (2012).
class dnn.optimization.Optimizer(data, layers, dropout_ratios=None, loss_func='MSE', parameters=None)¶

Bases: object

Default interface for an optimizer implementation - this provides the necessary parameter updates when training a model on a dataset using an online stochastic process. The base framework for performing stochastic gradient descent.

func(x, y)¶
update(step_w, step_b, index)¶
class dnn.optimization.OptimizerParameters(algorithm='Adadelta', num_epochs=100, mini_batch_size=100, options=None)¶
class dnn.optimization.SGD(train_data, epochs, mini_batch_size, momentum, valid_data=None)¶
update_mini_batch(mini_batch, eta)¶

Update the network’s weights and biases by applying gradient descent using backpropagation to a single mini batch. The mini_batch is a list of tuples (x, y), and eta is the learning rate.
